translation.home.greeting: Hello! I am <1>{{name}}</1>, Full Stack PHP and Front-End artist.
translation.about.title: ABOUT <1>ME</1>
translation.about.text:
Hello, welcome! üñêüèª

My name is {{name}}, I live in {{city}}, I have a degree in {{degree}} and I am finishing my post-graduation in Front-End.

I discovered programming in engineering school, and after getting my first job in the field, I had to work in various areas, but it was in web development, especially in front-end, that I found my calling.

Today I am a Full Stack PHP Developer for 3 years and work outsourced for {{company}}.
